Legal entity

Legal advice in the United States is rendered by Mannheimer Swartling Advokatbyrå LLP in New York. Mannheimer Swartling Advokatbyrå LLP is a limited liability partnership registered in New York State.

Mannheimer Swartling Advokatbyrå LLP

Laws and regulations

Mannheimer Swartling and its lawyers are regulated by the Swedish Bar Association.
The conduct of the attorneys admitted to practice law in New York State is also overseen by the Appellate Division of the Supreme Court of New York.

Attorney Advertising Notice

Under the New York Rules of Professional Conduct some of the contents on Mannheimer Swartling’s website may constitute attorney advertising. The following information is given to comply with those rules: Attorney advertising; Prior results do not guarantee a similar outcome.
